SEARCH
Package gw.plugin.policy.cloud

Class GraphBasedPolicySearchAndRetrieveAdapterImpl

java.lang.Object
gw.plugin.policy.cloud.GraphBasedPolicySearchAndRetrieveAdapterImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
InternalPlugin, InitializablePlugin, IPolicySearchAdapter, Remote
public class GraphBasedPolicySearchAndRetrieveAdapterImpl extends Object implements IPolicySearchAdapter, InitializablePlugin
This IPolicySearchAdapter implementation calls ICloudRetrievePolicyPlugin.getPolicyGraph(PolicySummary) to fetch the policy JSON string from the external system if the ICloudRetrievePolicyPlugin is enabled and ICloudRetrievePolicyPlugin.shouldUseGraphRetrieveForPolicyType(PolicyType) returns true

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from interface gw.plugin.InitializablePlugin

    ROOT_DIR, TEMP_DIR

      Parameters for the plugin, includes directories and parameters defined in config.xml.

      Parameters:

    • retrievePolicyFromPolicySummary

      public PolicyRetrievalResultSet retrievePolicyFromPolicySummary(PolicySummary policySummary) throws RemoteException
      Retrieve a single, unique policy based on a PolicySummary entity. If ICloudRetrievePolicyPlugin.shouldUseGraphRetrieveForPolicyType(PolicyType) returns true, it calls the ICloudRetrievePolicyPlugin.getPolicyGraph(PolicySummary), otherwise delegates to IPolicySearchAdapter.retrievePolicyFromPolicySummary(PolicySummary) that is registered in IFallbackPolicySearchPlugin.gwp.
      Specified by:
      retrievePolicyFromPolicySummary in interface IPolicySearchAdapter
      Parameters:
      policySummary - a PolicySummary entity containing all the information required to uniquely identify the Policy to be returned
      Returns:
      The retrieved Policy
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • retrievePolicySummaryFromPolicy

      public PolicySummary retrievePolicySummaryFromPolicy(Policy policy) throws RemoteException
      Retrieve the policy summary associated with the specified policy by calling IPolicySearchAdapter.retrievePolicyFromPolicySummary(PolicySummary) that is registered in IFallbackPolicySearchPlugin.gwp CC uses this for policy refresh to support risk unit selection.
      Specified by:
      retrievePolicySummaryFromPolicy in interface IPolicySearchAdapter
      Parameters:
      policy - a Policy entity which already exists in ClaimCenter.
      Returns:
      A non-null structure representing a policy search results, which should be a single PolicySummary.
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • retrievePolicyFromPolicy

      public PolicyRetrievalResultSet retrievePolicyFromPolicy(Policy policy) throws RemoteException
      Retrieve a single, unique policy based on an existing Policy entity. If the plugin parameter "useGraphBasedPolicyRetrieveForRefresh" is set to true, and ICloudRetrievePolicyPlugin.shouldUseGraphRetrieveForPolicyType(PolicyType) returns true, it calls the ICloudRetrievePolicyPlugin.getPolicyGraph(PolicySummary), otherwise delegates to IPolicySearchAdapter.retrievePolicyFromPolicySummary(PolicySummary) that is registered in IFallbackPolicySearchPlugin.gwp.
      Specified by:
      retrievePolicyFromPolicy in interface IPolicySearchAdapter
      Parameters:
      policy - a Policy entity which already exists in ClaimCenter. The Policy returned should match this one in all respects, including incomplete population of extended parts of the entity (like arrays)
      Returns:
      A non-null structure representing a single matching policy.
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • searchPolicies

      public PolicySearchResultSet searchPolicies(PolicySearchCriteria criteria) throws RemoteException
      Search a policy store by calling IPolicySearchAdapter.retrievePolicyFromPolicySummary(PolicySummary) that is registered in IFallbackPolicySearchPlugin.gwp
      Specified by:
      searchPolicies in interface IPolicySearchAdapter
      Parameters:
      criteria - Policy search criteria.
      Returns:
      A non-null structure representing the policy search results.
      Throws:
      RemoteException
